extendedInfo.description: ââââ Rope'n'Fly - From Dusk Till Dawn is the sequel to the best selling game, Rope'n'Fly ââââThis full version has all characters, ropes and daytimes included and has no Ads!â¢ More than 25 million addicted Rope'n'Fly players can't be wrong! â¨â¢ #1 top free app in US, France, Germany, UK, Australia, and more â¢ #10 top free app in more than 50 countries â¢ New and Noteworthy by Apple in multiple countries â¢ The sequel to the #1 most downloaded swinging game, now in HD and universal! â¢ From the makers of Stickman Base Jumper, Stick Stunt Biker, Line Birds, Line Surfer, Line Runner, RunStickRun and more Use your ropes to swing a destructible ragdoll from one skyscraper to the others. You have full control over your ropes, touch on a building to throw your rope there, touch again to release it and fly through the sky. Perform various kind of jumps to get achievements, attach to flying planes or ballons and try to beat your friends or all other players by competing with them for the best score.â¨FEATURES:â¨â¢ Tight and fast paced gameplay â¢ Amazing looking graphics â¢ Realistic physic engine for the player, ropes and objects â¢ Play in different daytime, from Dusk through Night till Dawn â¢ Customize your player, choose from characters and ropesâ¨â¢ Destructible ragdoll effects â¢ Various objects to rope to like balloons or planesâ¨â¢ Endless playing in never ending citiesâ¨â¢ Various game modes including free mode Video Trailer: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nN53F1xzA3Q â¨Feel free to post your ideas, we will try to implement them as soon as possibleâ¨Thank you very much for all your support and interest in our games! We would love to hear your suggestions!PERFORMANCE HINT:If you have performance problems or the game is running slow on your device make sure you disable display power saving

reviews.title: Ads in paid app.
reviews.comment: Update adds invasive advertising during game play. Do Not Purchase.
reviews.author: Ryan McGie

reviews.title: Still ads?
reviews.comment: I paid for the app and I still get ads? WTF? Besides that and the choppy game play, it\'s not bad. 5 stars if the ads were removed (like they should be) and the game ran smoother.
reviews.author: Rene Bernardino

reviews.title: 1st game I bought wen I got my nexus 7,
reviews.comment: Played this almost everyday for months, easy 5 stars. Could use leaderboards,,,,,,,,,,,,too many adds for other games.

reviews.title: Like it lots
reviews.comment: I\'ve stopped beating my meat as much so I can play this game.

reviews.comment: Why the heck are there ads in my paid app?

reviews.comment: fun and entertaining
reviews.author: Cody Loomis

reviews.title: Addicting
reviews.comment: Can\'t stop playing
reviews.author: Ozzie Anaya

reviews.title: Needs more variety
reviews.comment: Really annoyed that recent update to free version promised fixes but inserted in your face adware. Prompted me to buy paid version though which says something about quality of game. The game physics are great and it\'s very addictive. The game needs more variety though especially given its price. Some set challenges and mini games would be great. It\'s a game I keep returning to and I played it for months on iPod. Despite its simplicity and relatively high price it\'s a rare must have. 4 year old loves it too!
